title: Windows 8.0 Pro VL x64 en-US Pre-Activated Sep2013
description:

No Programs are added to Windows
No Registry Settings were modified
No Unattended Settings were added to the ISO

murphy78 presents Windows 8.0 Pro VL x64 en-US Sep2013
Contains all KB files to bring current to Sep9-2013 patch date

Features:
-Non-Activated index and KMS-Activated indexes
KMS-Activated index will Activate before first logon and
renew activation every 7 days.
-MS DaRT8 SP1 integrated into "Repair this computer" boot option
-Recent Windows Updates included for extra security
-Included notes from my KMS-SS for Office activation
and other information. You do not need to read to use.
-UEFI boot information added to ISO boot data

Changes from recent Windows 8 ProVL releases:
-Changed to install.esd format using Win8.1 dism export to install.esd
option's new recovery compression method. It makes the overall ISO
much smaller; and hence less complaining about seeds.
